channel.title: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
channel.description:
Here it is as a .bat its V1 i will keep adding more ideas to it but for now i think its not to bad [code]@echo off
echo This is the ultimate plan to make a story made by Ancient(V1).
echo. Ancientforums.smfforfree2.com
echo Choose one of the options below:
echo.
echo -plan
echo -website
echo -credits
echo -exit
set /p input= if %input%==plan goto recipt if %input%==exit goto exit if %input%==website goto website if %input%==credits goto credits
:recipt echo First when is the story set? echo Past: Present: Future
set /p input= if %input%==present goto Opt1 if %input%==past goto Opt2 if %input%==future goto Opt3 echo -exit pause :1st echo First or 3rd Person? echo 1st:3rd set /p input= if %input%==1st goto main character 1 if %input%==3rd goto main character 1 echo -exit pause :Opt1 echo Theme? echo Alien invasion(type alien):War:Dictatorship(type dict):Rebellion(type reb) set /p input= if %input%==alien goto 1st if %input%==war goto 1st if %input%==dict goto 1st if %input%==reb goto 1st echo -exit pause :Opt2 echo Theme? echo RS sort of thing:Egyptian(type egypt):WWII(type ww2) or WWI(ww1): Ancient Greece/Rome(ancient) set /p input= if %input%==rs goto 1st if %input%==egypt goto 1st if %input%==ww2 goto 1st if %input%==ww1 goto 1st if %input%==ancient goto 1st echo -exit pause :Opt3 echo Theme? echo You're on you own WAY to many options :D(type cont) set /p input= if %input%==cont goto 1st echo -exit pause :main character 1 echo Main character(s)? echo 1:Group set /p input= if %input%==1 goto main character 2 if %input%==group goto main character 2 echo -exit pause :main character 2 echo Main character? echo Boy:Girl set /p input= if %input%==boy goto main character 3 if %input%==girl goto main character 3 echo -exit pause :main character 3 echo Main Character? echo Special Powers(type special):Normal set /p input= if %input%==special goto plot if %input%==normal goto plot echo -exit pause :plot echo Plot? echo A Mystery:Out and Out BLOOD AND GORE :P(type gore) set /p input= if %input%==mystery goto main character 4 if %input%==gore goto main character 4 echo -exit pause :main character 4 echo Main character? echo special(why?):Normal set /p input= if %input%==special goto end if %input%==normal goto end echo -exit pause :end echo Now you have your idea for a story laid out i hope echo you enjoyed the Ancient Story.bat file :credits echo All Ancient echo Type exit to leave or type plan to start again set /p input= if %input%==exit goto exit if %input%==plan goto recipt pause :website echo ancientforums.smfforfree2.com echo type exit to leave or type plan to start again set /p input= if %input%==exit goto exit if %input%==plan goto recipt pause
:exit exit pause [/code]

item.title: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Hmm… He made this and is obviously proud of it, we all started somewhere, did we not?
Personally I started with Java so I was lucky to actually start on a language, instead of Batch. But, well done.

Read full topic

item.title: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

I find that if you can’t summon the creativity to think of a topic, you won’t be able to write a story on your given topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Monster Hack, where have you been? It’s been like this since… Forever. Nothing you say or do will change it. And you will either alienate yourself from the community, or you’ll conform. So quit trying to act like you’re better than the rest and shut the Hell up.

Let me rephrase that last bit, *a certain group of people act like dicks.
Aren’t you a positive one? By standing up for someone who’s getting put down isn’t a way of me bettering myself, but by putting people down is.
So don’t tell me to shut up, I have every right to post and to be nice to someone.

newbiehacker:

I doubt anyone could be proud of programming in something that’s not even a language. I think that batch is probably WORSE than visual basic: At least visual basic makes programs.

Awh think back to the very beginning newbie, I’m sure the first thing you whipped up made you happy.

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:165511”]I never liked VB for big programs, Its really for people who cant learn a real language. I use it for quick things and neat things but never for anything good.

Batch is alright for quick things, i like to play around with it :P. But to make something and post it like you own the world, no.[/quote]
Naah, VB is more for people who’d rather not dedicate that much time to programming, not that they can’t learn a “real” one.
And I don’t know if that last comment was at this topic, but he never was boasting about it, just kinda happy/proud I would say.

-Mh

Read full topic
item.source: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)

I doubt anyone could be proud of programming in something that’s not even a language. I think that batch is probably WORSE than visual basic: At least visual basic makes programs.

I never liked VB for big programs, Its really for people who cant learn a real language. I use it for quick things and neat things but never for anything good.

Batch is alright for quick things, i like to play around with it :P. But to make something and post it like you own the world, no.

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Monster Hack, post:8, topic:165511”]And this is why I don’t post any of my things on this site, most people here act like total dicks.
He made something that may be useless in your minds, but I’m sure he enjoyed making it. Whether you make something useful or useless, you’re normally proud of it. So just congratulate him, and leave him be.

Nice job bud.

-Mh[/quote]

Monster Hack, where have you been? It’s been like this since… Forever. Nothing you say or do will change it. And you will either alienate yourself from the community, or you’ll conform. So quit trying to act like you’re better than the rest and shut the Hell up.

item.source: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)

item.title: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Here it is as a .bat its V1 i will keep adding more ideas to it but for now i think its not to bad

[code]@echo off

echo This is the ultimate plan to make a story made by Ancient(V1).

echo. Ancientforums.smfforfree2.com

echo Choose one of the options below:

echo.

echo -plan

echo -website

echo -credits

echo -exit

set /p input=
if %input%==plan goto recipt
if %input%==exit goto exit
if %input%==website goto website
if %input%==credits goto credits

:recipt
echo First when is the story set?
echo Past: Present: Future

set /p input=
if %input%==present goto Opt1
if %input%==past goto Opt2
if %input%==future goto Opt3
echo -exit
pause
:1st
echo First or 3rd Person?
echo 1st:3rd
set /p input=
if %input%==1st goto main character 1
if %input%==3rd goto main character 1
echo -exit
pause
:Opt1
echo Theme?
echo Alien invasion(type alien):War:Dictatorship(type dict):Rebellion(type reb)
set /p input=
if %input%==alien goto 1st
if %input%==war goto 1st
if %input%==dict goto 1st
if %input%==reb goto 1st
echo -exit
pause
:Opt2
echo Theme?
echo RS sort of thing:Egyptian(type egypt):WWII(type ww2) or WWI(ww1): Ancient Greece/Rome(ancient)
set /p input=
if %input%==rs goto 1st
if %input%==egypt goto 1st
if %input%==ww2 goto 1st
if %input%==ww1 goto 1st
if %input%==ancient goto 1st
echo -exit
pause
:Opt3
echo Theme?
echo You’re on you own WAY to many options :D(type cont)
set /p input=
if %input%==cont goto 1st
echo -exit
pause
:main character 1
echo Main character(s)?
echo 1:Group
set /p input=
if %input%==1 goto main character 2
if %input%==group goto main character 2
echo -exit
pause
:main character 2
echo Main character?
echo Boy:Girl
set /p input=
if %input%==boy goto main character 3
if %input%==girl goto main character 3
echo -exit
pause
:main character 3
echo Main Character?
echo Special Powers(type special):Normal
set /p input=
if %input%==special goto plot
if %input%==normal goto plot
echo -exit
pause
:plot
echo Plot?
echo A Mystery:Out and Out BLOOD AND GORE :P(type gore)
set /p input=
if %input%==mystery goto main character 4
if %input%==gore goto main character 4
echo -exit
pause
:main character 4
echo Main character?
echo special(why?):Normal
set /p input=
if %input%==special goto end
if %input%==normal goto end
echo -exit
pause
:end
echo Now you have your idea for a story laid out i hope
echo you enjoyed the Ancient Story.bat file
:credits
echo All Ancient
echo Type exit to leave or type plan to start again
set /p input=
if %input%==exit goto exit
if %input%==plan goto recipt
pause
:website
echo ancientforums.smfforfree2.com
echo type exit to leave or type plan to start again
set /p input=
if %input%==exit goto exit
if %input%==plan goto recipt
pause

:exit
exit
pause [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Determining what you want to write a story about(.bat)
